faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about working together

timeline.question: What's your typical project timeline?
timeline.answer:
Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity:

• Simple websites: 2-4 weeks
• Complex web applications: 6-12 weeks
• AI integration projects: 4-8 weeks
• Full rebrand + website: 8-16 weeks

I always provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation, and I'm transparent about any potential delays or changes throughout the process.

international.question: Do you work with international clients?
international.answer: Yes, I work with clients worldwide. Most of my projects are completed remotely, but I'm also available for on-site projects when needed.

aiServices.question: What's included in your AI integration services?
aiServices.answer: My AI integration services include workflow automation, intelligent chatbots, automated data processing, integration with existing tools, and custom AI solutions tailored to your specific needs.

revisions.question: How do you handle project revisions?
revisions.answer: I include a specific number of revisions in each project, typically 2-3 rounds of major revisions. I'm transparent about what's included and clearly communicate any scope changes that might require additional revisions.

payment.question: What's your payment structure?
payment.answer: I typically work with a 50% initial payment to start the project, and the balance upon delivery. For larger projects, we can establish payment milestones. I'm flexible and adapt the structure based on project needs.

support.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
support.answer: Yes! I offer ongoing maintenance, updates, and support packages to ensure your project continues to perform optimally after launch. This includes monitoring, security updates, and technical support.
